column3: Could you shorten the first line of the commitmsg so that it doesnt truncate?\nOther than that, looks good for pull.\n
@TheBlueMatt You'd like it to not truncate within the GitHub interface here? c0b922f is the only commit message that is truncated for me. I can shorten this if this is what you're requesting.\n
@TheBlueMatt Okay, I amended that last commit to make the first line shorter. Hopefully that is what you wanted and hopefully I did it correctly =)\n
@jayschwa yep, that looks good, ack from here\n
